Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Carlos M.
Reviews.Content: it was ok, everrything was in order as spected, I'm realy happy with this camera, I will recomend this to my friends

Reviews.Title: Haven't really had time to come to a full conclusion...
Reviews.Author: globetrotter "wedgefield"
Reviews.Content: As in my subject heading. Not yet really become totally familiar with this camera. I bought it because I had, had an Exilim before a Z1200 that I dropped & which killed it. One feature that I had liked was the 2 in 1 & 3 in 1 picture features on it. However this camera does not have that & in that I am a little disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features: O Casio Exilim EX-ZS150 Digital Camera Gold EX-ZS150GD
ProductInfo.Name: O Casio Exilim EX-ZS150 Digital Camera Gold EX-ZS150GD
